Articles.Content:
Hello

So, my game crashes a lot. I went to look at the KSP.log file, and found the following line spammed 360,213 times. I counted. With the Notepad++ count option. What, you think I'm going to count those by hand? 

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
	JSI.JSIVariableAnimator.Update ()

and 

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
	JSI.JSIVariableAnimator.LateUpdate ()

 

Anyone have any clue?

I've uploaded the logs below if anyone is able to help me with my crash on reverting to VAB, Launch, SPH, going to the space center, or just about anything that has to do with leaving my doomed vehicle. Or if they want to see the exception spam.

 

Thanks!

 

KSP.log: http://www.This website cannot be used on these forums/download/19885mz572a9z1a/KSP.log

Two-million line long output_log.txt: http://www.This website cannot be used on these forums/view/42301q7c31bkgk2/output_log.txt

Mods.ckan file: http://www.This website cannot be used on these forums/download/7494b6d3vghb8ur/mods.ckan

Edited February 15, 2016 by space55
